wikipedia_page.main: David William Craig (born 11 June 1969, in Glasgow) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a defender. He played for numerous clubs in the Scottish Football League, including East Stirlingshire, Dundee United, Hamilton Academical and Ayr United. He was named in the PFA Scotland Third Division Team of the Year for 2006–07 while playing for Dumbarton.

response: *David Craig (Northern Irish footballer) (born 1966),, Retired Northern Irish footballer who played for Newcastle  United playing at right back
*David Craig, Baron Craig of Radley (born 1929), retired British Chief of the Defence Staff and Marshal of the RAF
*David Craig (author), British former management consultant and writer criticising management consultancy
*David Craig, a pseudonym of the Welsh writer James Tucker (born 1929)
David Craig (born 8 June 1944) is a Northern Irish retired footballer. His position was right-back.

Hodge dropped a division, making his debut for Second Division Partick Thistle as a substitute for David Craig in a 6–1 defeat against Gretna in January 2006. Partick finished the 2005–06 season 4th in the Second Division, qualifying for the First Division play-offs, which they won and were promoted to Division 1 in place of Stranraer.
